p: Google Developer Group (GDG) is a global community of developers, enthusiasts, and tech professionals interested in Google's technologies. Run by volunteers independently, GDG chapters are established worldwide, hosting events, workshops, and conferences to foster knowledge sharing, collaboration, and networking. Focusing on Google tech like Android, Firebase, and TensorFlow, GDG cultivates a vibrant developer community, providing opportunities to learn, grow, and connect with like-minded peers. Please note that GDG is not directly supported or sponsored by Google.
